rental_description: Users can choose check in & out date üìÖ, number of guests üë• or extra service üõéÔ∏è and send a request to the host to book a reservation. Once the host accepts request user can be charged for the entire amount at reserved time (payments are processed through WooCommerce).
rental_feature_2: Hourly Booking (Start / End Time - helpful for renting cars, bikes etc.)
rental_feature_3: Regular, weekend and custom price per night or hour
rental_feature_4: Max. guests per reservation and minimum stay
services_description: Users can reserve spots at e.g. restaurants üçù barbers üíà etc. They can choose date and time or specific hour. If time slots are non set - in this case time picker will be displayed in the booking widget instead of time slots and guests will be able to make reservations only in opening hours range.
